title: GIGIZAZA Gold Velvet Decorative Throw Pillow Covers,18x18 Pillow Covers for Couch Sofa Bed 2 Pack Soft Cushion Covers
descriptions:
Introducing the GIGIZAZA Gold Velvet Decorative Throw Pillow Covers! Enhance the look and feel of your couch, sofa, or bed with these luxurious and stylish pillow covers. Made from 100% velvet material, they offer a soft and comfortable texture that you'll love to snuggle up against.

This set includes 2 pillow covers, perfect for adding a touch of elegance to your living space. The beautiful gold color adds a touch of glamour and sophistication to any room. With dimensions of 18 x 18 inches (45 x 45 cm), these covers are designed to fit most standard pillows. They are also compatible with 18 x 18 inch or 20 x 20 inch inserts, ensuring a perfect fit for your desired level of comfort.

The invisible zipper closure adds a seamless and clean look to the pillow covers. The zipper length is longer than 35cm, making it easy to insert and remove the pillows. Whether you want to decorate your living room, bed, chair, window seat, coffee shop, office, or even your car, these pillow covers are versatile enough to fit any space.

Cleaning these pillow covers is a breeze. They are machine washable, and we recommend using cold water for washing and a low drying temperature. This ensures that the covers maintain their softness and shape for a long time.

At GIGIZAZA, we value your satisfaction. That's why we offer customer support to address any suggestions or improvements you may have. We strive to provide the best quality products and service to our customers.

Upgrade your home decor with the GIGIZAZA Gold Velvet Decorative Throw Pillow Covers. Experience the ultimate comfort and style with these luxurious pillow covers.
